meanings.sent1: The conductibilities of metals make them good conductors of electricity.
meanings.sent2: Electricians study the conductibilities of different materials to ensure safety in wiring.
meanings.sent3: The conductibilities of the wires were so high that even the smallest current could pass through.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of the conductibilities of various elements was as sharp as a lightning bolt.
meanings.sent5: The conductibilities of the circuit were so strong that it lit up the entire room.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being conductible.
meanings.sent1: The conductibilities of the material were tested to determine its suitability for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The conductibilities of the substance were crucial for its use in the electrical device.
meanings.sent3: The conductibilities of the liquid were so high that it could easily transmit electricity.
meanings.sent4: The conductibilities of the wire were like a pathway for the electrical current.
meanings.sent5: The conductibilities of the solution were evident when it conducted electricity effortlessly.

meanings.definition: The measure of how easily a material conducts heat or electricity.
meanings.sent1: Scientists use specific tools to measure the conductibilities of different materials.
meanings.sent2: The conductibilities of the metal were compared to determine the most efficient conductor.
meanings.sent3: The conductibilities of the material were so high that it could heat up instantly.
meanings.sent4: The conductibilities of the wire were like a fast lane for electricity.
meanings.sent5: The conductibilities of the substance were so clear that it conducted heat rapidly.
